description:
A young blonde-haired girl visits the Kurogane House, and claims she`s the daughter of a dead man. Shiro, having fallen for Lorelai, is led to Germany, where her father lives. Koji goes after him... but what`s this about a Kabuto family secret?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 初恋? 美少女ローレライ!
